member.summary: Traverse through list of contig-read match indexes for given read.
member.param: Position from where list of indexes should be traversed.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Utility.ReadAlignment.FindContinuous(MBF.Algorithms.Kmer.KmerIndexer,System.Collections.Generic.IList{MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.ReadMap},System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Merge continuous positions of a read in kmer indexes.

member.summary: Find if positions occur simultaneously of read in contig, if contig is traced from right direction
member.param: map from previous position of read
member.returns: True if continuous position of reads in contig.

member.returns: true if continuous position of reads in contig.

member.name: T:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.GraphScaffoldBuilder
member.summary: Generates Scaffolds using Graph. Algorithm: Step1: Generate contig overlap graph. Step2: Map Reads to contigs. Step3: Generate Contig Mate Pair Map. Step4: Filter Paired Reads. Step5: Distance Orientation. Step6: Trace Scaffold Paths. Step7: Assemble paths. Step8: Generate sequence of scaffolds.

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.GraphScaffoldBuilder._redundancy
member.summary: Number of paired read required to connect two contigs.

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.GraphScaffoldBuilder._depth
member.summary: Depth for graph traversal.

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.GraphScaffoldBuilder._kmerLength
member.summary: kmer length.

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.GraphScaffoldBuilder._mapPairedReads
member.summary: Mapping reads to mate pairs.

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.GraphScaffoldBuilder._readContigMap
member.summary: Mapping reads to contigs.

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.GraphScaffoldBuilder._pairedReadFilter
member.summary: Filtering of mate pairs based on orientation of contigs.

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.GraphScaffoldBuilder._distanceCalculator
member.summary: Calculation of distance between contigs using mate pairs.

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.GraphScaffoldBuilder._tracePath
member.summary: Traversal of contig overlap graph.

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.GraphScaffoldBuilder._pathAssembler
member.summary: Removal of containing paths and removal of overlapping paths.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.GraphScaffoldBuilder.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the GraphScaffoldBuilder class.
Initializes a new instance of the GraphScaffoldBuilder class.
member.param: Calculation of distance between contigs using mate pairs.
Removal of containing paths and removal of overlapping paths.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.GraphScaffoldBuilder.BuildScaffold(System.Collections.Generic.IList{MBF.ISequence},System.Collections.Generic.IList{MBF.ISequence},System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Builds scaffolds from list of reads and contigs
member.param: Number of mate pairs required to create a link between two contigs. Hierarchical Scaffolding With Bambus by: Mihai Pop, Daniel S. Kosack, Steven L. Salzberg Genome Research, Vol. 14, No. 1. (January 2004), pp. 149-159.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.GraphScaffoldBuilder.GenerateContigOverlapGraph(System.Collections.Generic.IList{MBF.ISequence})
member.summary: Generate contig overlap graph.

member.summary: Map reads to contigs.

member.summary: Map paired reads to contigs using FASTA sequence header.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.GraphScaffoldBuilder.FilterReadsBasedOnOrientation(MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.ContigMatePairs)
member.summary: Filter reads based on orientation of contigs.

member.summary: Calculate distance between contigs using paired reads.

member.summary: Performs Breadth First Search in contig overlap graph.

member.summary: Generate sequences from list of contig nodes.

member.name: T:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.DanglingLinksPurger
member.summary: Dangling links are caused by errors occuring at the end of read. This class implements the methods for detecting dangling links and removing the nodes on dangling links from the graph. This also implements graph erosion, where ends of graph which have low coverage are removed.

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.DanglingLinksPurger._lengthThreshold
member.summary: Threshold length for dangling links

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.DanglingLinksPurger._erodeThreshold
member.summary: User Input Parameter Threshold for eroding low coverage ends

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.DanglingLinksPurger._danglingLinkLengths
member.summary: Field used to keep track of the minimum length of dangling link that crosses the length threshold. This is used to update the threshold for next round.

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.DanglingLinksPurger._danglingLinkExtensionTasks
member.summary: Tasks queued to extend dangling links following graph clean-up after erosion.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.DanglingLinksPurger.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DanglingLinksPurger class.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.DanglingLinksPurger.ErodeGraphEnds(MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnGraph,System.Int32)
member.summary: Erode ends of graph that have coverage less than given erodeThreshold. As optimization, we also check for dangling links and keeps track of the lengths of the links found. No removal is done at this step. This is done to get an idea of the different lengths at which to run the dangling links purger step. This method returns the lengths of dangling links found. Locks: Method only does reads. No locking necessary here.
member.returns: List of lengths of dangling links detected

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.DanglingLinksPurger.DetectErroneousNodes(MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnGraph)
member.summary: Detect nodes that are part of dangling links Locks: Method only does reads. No locking necessary here or its callees.
member.returns: List of nodes in dangling links

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.DanglingLinksPurger.RemoveErroneousNodes(MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnGraph,MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnPathList)
member.summary: Removes nodes that are part of dangling links

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.DanglingLinksPurger.RemoveErodedNodes(MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnGraph,System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnNode}@)
member.summary: Delete nodes marked for erosion. Update adjacent nodes to update their extension tables. After nodes are deleted, some new end-points might be created. We need to check for dangling links at these new points. This list is returned in the out parameter.
member.param: Out parameter. List of graph nodes to check for dangling links

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.DanglingLinksPurger.RemoveLinkNodes(MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnPath,System.Collections.Generic.HashSet{MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnNode})
member.summary: Removes nodes in link from the graph. Parallelization Note: Locks required here. We are modifying graph structure here.
member.param: Set of all nodes occuring at end of dangling links

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.DanglingLinksPurger.TraceDanglingExtensionLink(System.Boolean,MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnPath,MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnNode,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Starting from potential end of dangling link, trace back along extension edges in graph to find if it is a valid dangling link. Parallelization Note: No locks used in TraceDanglingLink. We only read graph structure here. No modifications are made.
member.param: Boolean indicating direction of dangling link
Node that is next on the link
member.returns: List of nodes in dangling link

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.DanglingLinksPurger.CheckAndAddDanglingNode(MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnPath,MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnNode,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Checks if 'node' can be added to 'link' without violating any conditions pertaining to dangling links. Returns null if loop is found or length exceeds threshold. Otherwise, adds node to link and returns
member.param: Indicates if we have reached end of dangling link

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.DanglingLinksPurger.ExtendDanglingLinks
member.summary: Try and extend previously terminated dangling links

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.DanglingLinksPurger.ExtendDanglingLink(System.Boolean,MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnPath,MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnNode,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Try and extend dangling links following graph clean-up after erosion.
member.param: Boolean indicating direction of dangling link
Node that is next on the link
Boolean indicating if last node in link has to be removed before extending
member.returns: Length of dangling link found after extension

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.DanglingLinksPurger.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the algorithm

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.DanglingLinksPurger.Description
member.summary: Gets the description of algorithm

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.DanglingLinksPurger.LengthThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the threshold length

member.summary: Input list of scaffold paths.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.PathPurger.PurgePath(System.Collections.Generic.IList{MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.ScaffoldPath})
member.summary: Removes containing paths and merge overlapping paths

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.PathPurger.SearchContainingAndOverlappingPaths(MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.ScaffoldPath,System.Boolean[])
member.summary: Search for containing and overlapping paths.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.PathPurger.RemoveContainingPaths(MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.ScaffoldPath,MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.ScaffoldPath)
member.summary: Remove containing paths.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.PathPurger.RemoveOverlappingPaths(MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.ScaffoldPath,MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.ScaffoldPath)
member.summary: Removes Overlapping paths by generating pairwise overlaps between paths.
Stiches overalpping paths and update the path.
member.param: End position of overlap in first path.
End position of overlap in second path.

member.summary: Removes all consumed path.

member.name: T:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler
member.summary: Implements a de bruijn based approach for assembly of DNA sequences.

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler._kmerLength
member.summary: User Input Parameter Length of k-mer

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler._dangleThreshold
member.summary: User Input Parameter Threshold for removing dangling ends in graph

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler._isErosionEnabled
member.summary: Bool to do erosion or not.

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler._erosionThreshold
member.summary: User Input Parameter Threshold for eroding low coverage ends

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler._redundantPathLengthThreshold
member.summary: User Input Parameter Length Threshold for removing redundant paths in graph

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler._contigCoverageThreshold
member.summary: Threshold used for removing low-coverage contigs

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler._lowCoverageContigPurger
member.summary: Class implementing Low coverage contig removal.

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler._sequenceReads
member.summary: List of input sequence reads. Different steps in the assembly may access this. Should be set before starting the assembly process.

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler._graph
member.summary: Holds the de bruijn graph used for assembly process. Graph creation modules sets this, so that further steps can access this for modifications.

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler._danglingLinksPurger
member.summary: Class implementing dangling links purging

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler._redundantPathsPurger
member.summary: Class implementing redundant paths purger

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler._contigBuilder
member.summary: Class implementing contig building

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler._scaffoldBuilder
member.summary: Class implementing scaffold building

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ParallelDeNovoAssembler class. Sets thresholds to default values. Also initializes instances implementing different steps

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.AddSequenceReads(System.Collections.Generic.IList{MBF.ISequence})
member.summary: Add given list of sequences to input read list

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.Assemble(System.Collections.Generic.IList{MBF.ISequence})
member.summary: Assemble the list of sequence reads

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.Assemble(System.Collections.Generic.IList{MBF.ISequence},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Assemble the list of sequence reads. Also performs the scaffold building step as part of assembly process.
member.param: Boolean indicating whether scaffold building step has to be run

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.EstimateKmerLength(System.Collections.Generic.IList{MBF.ISequence})
member.summary: For optimal graph formation, k-mer length should not be less than half the length of the longest input sequence and cannot be more than the length of the shortest input sequence. Reference for estimating kmerlength from reads: Supplement material from publication "ABySS: A parallel assembler for short read sequence data"

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.EstimateDefaultThresholds
member.summary: Estimates and sets erosion and coverage threshold for contigs. Median value of kmer coverage is set as default value. Reference: ABySS Release Notes 1.1.1 - "The default threshold is the square root of the median k-mer coverage"

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.RemoveAmbiguousReads(System.Collections.Generic.IList{MBF.ISequence})
member.summary: Removes input sequences that have ambiguous symbols. Updates the field holding sequence reads.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.CreateGraph
member.summary: Step 1: Building k-mers from sequence reads Step 2: Build de bruijn graph for input set of k-mers. Sets the _assemblerGraph field.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.UnDangleGraph
member.summary: Step 3: Remove dangling links from graph

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.RemoveRedundancy
member.summary: Step 4: Remove redundant paths from graph

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.BuildContigs
member.summary: Step 5: Build contigs from de bruijn graph. If coverage threshold is set, remove low coverage contigs.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.BuildScaffolds(System.Collections.Generic.IList{MBF.ISequence})
member.summary: Step 6: Build scaffolds from contig list and paired reads

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.ValidateAllSequences(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{MBF.ISequence})
member.summary: Validate input sequences

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.Initialize(System.Collections.Generic.IList{MBF.ISequence})
member.summary: Sets up fields for the assembly process.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.InitializeDefaultGraphModifiers
member.summary: Initializes the above defined fields. For each step in assembly we use a seperate class for implementation. This method assigns these variables to classes with desired implementation.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.Dispose
member.summary: Implements dispose to supress GC finalize This is done as one of the methods uses ReadWriterLockSlim which extends IDisposable.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Dispose field instances
member.param: If disposeManaged equals true, clean all resources

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the current assembly algorithm used. This property returns the Name of our assembly algorithm i.e Parallel De Novo algorithm.

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.Description
member.summary: Gets the description of the current assembly algorithm used. This property returns a simple description of what Parallel De Novo class implements.

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.KmerLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the kmer length

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.AllowKmerLengthEstimation
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to estimate kmer length.

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.Graph
member.summary: Gets the assembler de-bruijn graph

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.DanglingLinksPurger
member.summary: Gets or sets the instance that implements dangling links purging step.

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.DanglingLinksThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the threshold length for dangling link purger.

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.AllowErosion
member.summary: Gets or sets value to allow erosion of the graph.

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.ErosionThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the threshold length for eroding low coverage graph ends. In case erosion step is not to be done, set this to 0. As an performance optimization in assembler process, erosion and dangling link purging step are done together in a single step. Note that because of this optimization, unless the danglingLinkPurger implements IGraphErodePurger, erosion will not be done irrespective of the threshold value provided.

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.RedundantPathsPurger
member.summary: Gets or sets the instance that implements redundant paths purging step.

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.RedundantPathLengthThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the length threshold for redundant paths purger.

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.LowCoverageContigPurger
member.summary: Gets or sets instance of class implementing Low coverage contig removal.

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.AllowLowCoverageContigRemoval
member.summary: Gets or sets the value to enable removal of low coverage contigs.

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.ContigCoverageThreshold
member.summary: Threshold used for removing low-coverage contigs

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.ContigBuilder
member.summary: Gets or sets the instance that implements contig building step.

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.ScaffoldBuilder
member.summary: Gets or sets the instance that implements scaffold building step.

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.ScaffoldRedundancy
member.summary: Gets or sets value of redundancy for building scaffolds.

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.ParallelDeNovoAssembler.Depth
member.summary: Gets or sets the Depth for graph traversal in scaffold builder step.

member.summary: Gets the list of sequence reads

member.name: T:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.SimplePathContigBuilder
member.summary: Class implements algorithm for extracting contig sequences from de bruijn graph. It detects simple paths in graph, and for each simple path in the graph, it generates corresponding sequence as a contig.

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.SimplePathContigBuilder._graph
member.summary: Holds reference to assembler graph

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.SimplePathContigBuilder._coverageThreshold
member.summary: Holds value of the coverage threshold to be used for filtering contigs.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.SimplePathContigBuilder.RemoveLowCoverageContigs(MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnGraph,System.Double)
member.summary: Build contigs from graph. For contigs whose coverage is less than the specified threshold, remove graph nodes belonging to them.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.SimplePathContigBuilder.Build(MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnGraph)
member.summary: Build contig sequences from the graph.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.SimplePathContigBuilder.ExcludeAmbiguousExtensions
member.summary: For nodes that have more than one extension in either direction, mark the extensions invalid. For nodes that have palidromic sequence, all extensions are marked invalid. This is because for a palidromic sequence, left and right extensions are inter-changable and this causes ambiguity. Locks: No locks used as extensions are only marked invalid, not deleted. Write locks not used because in only possible conflict both threads will try to write same value to memory. So race is harmless.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.SimplePathContigBuilder.IsPalindrome(MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnNode)
member.summary: Checks if the sequence in the node is a palindrome. A sequence is palindrome if it is same as its reverse complement. Reference: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Palindromic_sequence
member.returns: Boolean indicating if node represents palidromic sequence

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.SimplePathContigBuilder.GetSimplePaths
member.summary: Get simple paths in the graph

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.SimplePathContigBuilder.TraceSimplePath(System.Collections.Generic.List{MBF.ISequence},MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnNode,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Trace simple path starting from 'node' in specified direction.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.SimplePathContigBuilder.TraceSimplePathLinks(System.Collections.Generic.List{MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnNode},MBF.ISequence,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnNode)
member.summary: Trace simple path in specified direction
member.param: List of graph nodes corresponding to contig path

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.SimplePathContigBuilder.CheckAndAddNode(System.Collections.Generic.List{MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnNode},MBF.ISequence,MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnNode,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Checks if 'node' can be added to 'path' without causing a loop. If yes, adds node to path and returns true. If not, returns false.
member.param: List of graph nodes corresponding to contig path
Next node on the path to be addded
member.returns: Boolean indicating if path was updated successfully

member.name: T:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.DistanceCalculator
member.summary: Class calculates distance between contigs using mate pairs mapped to contigs. Reference: The Greedy Path-Merging Algorithm for contig Scaffolding: HUSON et al.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.DistanceCalculator.CalculateDistance(MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.ContigMatePairs)
member.summary: Calculates distances between contigs.
member.param: Input Contigs and mate pairs mappping.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.DistanceCalculator.CalculateInterContigDistance(System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{MBF.ISequence,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{MBF.ISequence,System.Collections.Generic.IList{MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.ValidMatePair}}},System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculate distance between single pair of contigs.

member.summary: Calculates distance between contigs for each pair of Full Overlap.
member.param: Valid mate pairs which have full Overlap and support a perticular orientation of contigs

member.summary: Bundles all valid mate pairs in single edge but considering ±3σ limit.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.DistanceCalculator.CalculateWeigthedEdge(System.Collections.Generic.IList{MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.ValidMatePair})
member.summary: Further estimates distances using weighted mean and standard deviation by merging valid mate pairs.

member.name: T:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.RedundantPathsPurger
member.summary: Redundant links are caused by single point mutations occuring in middle of reads. This class implements the methods for detecting redundant paths, and then removing all but one path.

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.RedundantPathsPurger._pathLengthThreshold
member.summary: Threshold for length of redundant paths

member.name: F:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.RedundantPathsPurger._graph
member.summary: Holds reference to assembler graph

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.RedundantPathsPurger.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the RedundantPathsPurger class. Takes user parameter for threshold.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.RedundantPathsPurger.DetectErroneousNodes(MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnGraph)
member.summary: Detect nodes that are on redundant paths. Start from any node that has ambiguous (more than one) extensions. From this node, trace path for each extension until either they converge to a single node or threshold length is exceeded. In case they converge, we have a set of redundant paths. We pick the best path based on the kmer counts of the path nodes. All paths other than the best one are returned for removal. Locks: Method only does reads. No locking necessary here or its callees.
member.returns: List of path nodes to be deleted

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.RedundantPathsPurger.RemoveErroneousNodes(MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnGraph,MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnPathList)
member.summary: Removes nodes that are part of redundant paths.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.RedundantPathsPurger.DetachBestPath(System.Collections.Generic.List{MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnPathList})
member.summary: Extract best path from the list of paths in each cluster. Take off the best path from list and return rest of the paths for removal.
member.returns: List of path nodes to be removed

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.RedundantPathsPurger.ExtractBestPath(MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnPathList)
member.summary: Extract best path from list of paths. For the current cluster of paths, return only those that should be removed.
member.returns: List of paths nodes to be deleted

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.RedundantPathsPurger.GetBestPath(MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnPathList)
member.summary: Gets the best path from the list of diverging paths. Path that has maximum sum of 'count' of belonging k-mers is best. In case there are multiple 'best' paths, we arbitrarily return one of them.

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.RedundantPathsPurger.GetStartNode(MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnPathList)
member.summary: Gets start node of redundant path cluster All paths in input are part of a redundant path cluster So all of them have the same start and the end node. Return the first node of first path
member.returns: Start node of redundant path cluster

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.RedundantPathsPurger.GetEndNode(MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnPathList)
member.summary: Gets end node of redundant path cluster All paths in input are part of a redundant path cluster So all of them have the same start and the end node. Return the last node of first path
member.returns: End node of redundant path cluster

member.summary: Traces diverging paths in given direction. For each path in the set of diverging paths, extend path by one node at a time. Continue this until all diverging paths converge to a single node or length threshold is exceeded. If paths converge, add path cluster containing list of redundant path nodes to list of redundant paths and return.
member.param: Node at starting point of divergence

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.RedundantPathsPurger.RemoveDuplicates(System.Collections.Generic.List{MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.Graph.DeBruijnPathList})
member.summary: Some set of paths will appear twice, one traced in forward direction and other in opposite. This method eliminate duplicates.

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.RedundantPathsPurger.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the algorithm.

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.RedundantPathsPurger.Description
member.summary: Gets the description of the algorithm.

member.name: P:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.RedundantPathsPurger.LengthThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets threshold for length of redundant paths

member.name: T:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.OrientationBasedMatePairFilter
member.summary:
Filter mate pairs based on support for contig orientation. The mate pairs support specific orientation of contigs, based on mapping of reverse read or forward read to specify orientation. Orientation 1 ----------) (------------- contig 1 contig 2
Orientation 2 ----------) (-------------
contig 2 contig 1

member.name: M:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.OrientationBasedMatePairFilter.FilterPairedReads(MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.ContigMatePairs,System.Int32)
member.summary: Filter Paired Read Based on Orientation.
member.param: Map between contigs using mate pair information.

Number of mate pairs required to create a link between two contigs. Hierarchical Scaffolding With Bambus by: Mihai Pop, Daniel S. Kosack, Steven L. Salzberg Genome Research, Vol. 14, No. 1. (January 2004), pp. 149-159.

member.name: T:MBF.Algorithms.Assembly.PaDeNA.Scaffold.ReadContigMapper
member.summary: Maps reads to contigs. Class map reads to contigs using kmer method of alignment. Each Sequence is broken in kmers. And these kmer are aligned with kmer of other sequences to generate ungapped alignments.
